name: RAW FOOTAGE
description: Raw Footage is a first-person horror game, travel with nothing but your camera through forests inhabited by vicious creatures while capturing what footage you can of them. You’re not the first, but if you can expose these beasts to the world you’ll be the last.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (Only 64bit) Processor: Intel Core i3 (64bit) / AMD Analogue Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 730 / AMD Analogue DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (Only 64bit) Processor: Intel Core i7 (64bit) / AMD Analogue Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 / AMD Analogue DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
